author: Dedar Singh Gill JC:
casenumber: High Court — Originating Summons No 1034 of 2019
casename: Millennium Pharmaceuticals, Inc v Zyfas Medical Co (sued as a firm)
counsel: Suhaimi bin Lazim and Yan Chongshuo (Mirandah Law LLP) for the plaintiff;Wong Siew Hong and Kuek Kai Liang (Eldan Law LLP) for the defendant.
tags: Statutory Interpretation/Construction of statute/Regulation 24(1)(a)(ii) of the Health Products (Therapeutic Products) Regulations 2016 (S329/2016)/Whether an operative omission under reg 24(1)(a)(ii) requires that the defendant knowingly or intentionally omits to state the existence of relevant patents
